source:
val storageAccountKey = ""
val inputContainer = ""
val storageAccountName = ""
val inputFolderPath = ""
val outputContainer = ""
val outputFolderPath = ""

// Case classes reflecting the schema of the email data coming from the GraphDataConnect Message table
case class GdcBody(ContentType: String, Content: String)
case class GdcEmailAddressFields(Name: String, Address: String)
case class GdcSender(EmailAddress: GdcEmailAddressFields)
case class GdcFrom(EmailAddress: GdcEmailAddressFields)
case class EmailAddress(EmailAddress: GdcEmailAddressFields)
case class RowInformation(errorInformation: String = "",
                          userReturnedNoData: Option[Boolean] = None,
                          isUserSummaryRow: Option[Boolean] = None,
                          userHasCompleteData: Option[Boolean] = None
                         )
case class GdcEmail(Id: String = "",
                    CreatedDateTime: String = "",
                    LastModifiedDateTime: String = "",
                    ChangeKey: String = "",
                    Categories: Seq[String] = List(),
                    ReceivedDateTime: String = "",
                    SentDateTime: String = "",
                    HasAttachments: Option[Boolean] = None,
                    InternetMessageId: String = "",
                    Subject: String = "",
                    Importance: String = "",
                    ParentFolderId: String = "",
                    ConversationId: String = "",
                    IsDeliveryReceiptRequested: Option[Boolean] = None,
                    IsReadReceiptRequested: Option[Boolean] = None,
                    IsRead: Option[Boolean] = None,
                    IsDraft: Option[Boolean] = None,
                    WebLink: String = "",
                    UniqueBody: GdcBody = GdcBody("", ""),
                    Sender: GdcSender = GdcSender(GdcEmailAddressFields("", "")),
                    From: GdcFrom = GdcFrom(GdcEmailAddressFields("", "")),
                    ToRecipients: Seq[EmailAddress] = List(),
                    CcRecipients: Seq[EmailAddress] = List(),
                    BccRecipients: Seq[EmailAddress] = List(),
                    ReplyTo: Seq[EmailAddress] = List(),
                    ODataType: String = "#Microsoft.OutlookServices.Message",
                    puser: String = "",
                    ptenant: String = "",
                    pAdditionalInfo: String = "",
                    datarow: Option[Int] = None,
                    userrow: Option[Int] = None,
                    pagerow: Option[Int] = None,
                    rowinformation: RowInformation = RowInformation()
                   )

outputs.name: stdout
outputs.text:
defined class GdcBody
defined class GdcEmailAddressFields
defined class GdcSender
defined class GdcFrom
defined class EmailAddress
defined class RowInformation
defined class GdcEmail

source:
// Case class reflecting a single record resulting by "flattening an email", i.e. by creating separate records for each recipient of an email (from To, CC, BCC fields)
case class GdcEmailFlattened(Id: String = "",
                             CreatedDateTime: String = "",
                             LastModifiedDateTime: String = "",
                             InternetMessageId: String = "",
                             Subject: String = "",
                             IsReadReceiptRequested: Option[Boolean] = None,
                             IsRead: Option[Boolean] = None,
                             IsDraft: Option[Boolean] = None,
                             WebLink: String = "",
                             Sender: String = "",
                             Sender_Name: String = "",
                             From: String = "",
                             From_Name: String = "",
                             ContentType: String = "",
                             Content: String = "",
                             Recipient: String,
                             RecipientName: String,
                             RecipientType: String,
                             ODataType: String = "",
                             puser: String = "",
                             ptenant: String = "",
                             datarow: Option[Int] = None,
                             userrow: Option[Int] = None,
                             pagerow: Option[Int] = None

val emailAddressRegex = """(?i)\b[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}\b""".r

def extractEmailAddressFromAddressField(stringField: String) : String = {
  val listEmailAddresses = emailAddressRegex.findAllIn(stringField).toList
  if (listEmailAddresses.nonEmpty) listEmailAddresses.head else ""
}

object GdcEmailFlattened{
  def apply(gdcEmail: GdcEmail, Recipient: String, RecipientName: String, RecipientType: String): GdcEmailFlattened = {
    new GdcEmailFlattened(
      Id = gdcEmail.Id,
      CreatedDateTime = gdcEmail.CreatedDateTime,
      LastModifiedDateTime = gdcEmail.LastModifiedDateTime,
      InternetMessageId = gdcEmail.InternetMessageId,
      Subject = gdcEmail.Subject,
      IsReadReceiptRequested = gdcEmail.IsReadReceiptRequested,
      IsRead = gdcEmail.IsRead,
      IsDraft = gdcEmail.IsDraft,
      WebLink = gdcEmail.WebLink,
      Sender = if (gdcEmail.Sender!=null && gdcEmail.Sender.EmailAddress != null && gdcEmail.Sender.EmailAddress.Address!=null ) extractEmailAddressFromAddressField(gdcEmail.Sender.EmailAddress.Address) else "",
      Sender_Name = if (gdcEmail.Sender!=null && gdcEmail.Sender.EmailAddress != null && gdcEmail.Sender.EmailAddress.Name!=null ) gdcEmail.Sender.EmailAddress.Name else "",
      From = if (gdcEmail.From!=null && gdcEmail.From.EmailAddress != null && gdcEmail.From.EmailAddress.Address!=null ) extractEmailAddressFromAddressField(gdcEmail.From.EmailAddress.Address) else "",
      From_Name = if (gdcEmail.From!=null && gdcEmail.From.EmailAddress != null && gdcEmail.From.EmailAddress.Name!=null ) gdcEmail.From.EmailAddress.Name else "",
      ContentType = gdcEmail.UniqueBody.ContentType,
      Content = gdcEmail.UniqueBody.Content,
      Recipient = if (Recipient != null) extractEmailAddressFromAddressField(Recipient) else Recipient,
      RecipientName = RecipientName,
      RecipientType = RecipientType,
      ODataType = gdcEmail.ODataType,
      puser = gdcEmail.puser,
      ptenant = gdcEmail.ptenant,
      datarow = gdcEmail.datarow,
      userrow = gdcEmail.userrow,
      pagerow = gdcEmail.pagerow
    )
  }
  
}

def flattenGdcEmail(gdcEmail: GdcEmail): Seq[GdcEmailFlattened] = {
  var flattenedEmails: Seq[GdcEmailFlattened] =  gdcEmail.ToRecipients.map(recipient => GdcEmailFlattened(gdcEmail, recipient.EmailAddress.Address, recipient.EmailAddress.Name, "To") )
  flattenedEmails ++=  gdcEmail.CcRecipients.map(recipient => GdcEmailFlattened(gdcEmail, recipient.EmailAddress.Address, recipient.EmailAddress.Name, "Cc") )
  flattenedEmails ++=  gdcEmail.BccRecipients.map(recipient => GdcEmailFlattened(gdcEmail, recipient.EmailAddress.Address, recipient.EmailAddress.Name, "Bcc") )
  flattenedEmails

outputs.name: stdout
